verses.name: Deuteronomy 29:27
verses.text: And the anger of the Lord was kindled against this land, to bring upon it all the curses that are written in this book:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 29:28
verses.text: And the Lord rooted them out of their land in anger, and in wrath, and in great indignation, and cast them into another land, as it is this day.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 29:29
verses.text: The secret things belong unto the Lord our God: but those things which are revealed belong unto us and to our children for ever, that we may do all the words of this law.
